title: A Sociological look at the European Super League with Dr. Mark Doidge
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr Mark Doidge from the University of Brighton about the proposed new European super league within the world of football. Mark outlines what the new competition was planned to look like, why it is so controversial and why it began to collapse as  soon as the plans were revealed across the media. Mark applies some Sociology to the events from the likes of Grmasci and Durkheim.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
